details.title: Programs in higher levels of information fusion [USAF applications]
details.abstract: The US Air Force future vision for information fusion is presented in the context of results of a study of long-term challenges in the science and technology of command and control and the programs of the Air Force designed to meet them. A new approach to research is presented that takes advantage of scientific challenge problems that are operationally validated in collaboration with research laboratories in government and industry.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
